pages.text: Their eyes will be cast down, disgrace will cover them, seeing that they had been asked to bow in adoration while they were whole
Then leave Me alone with those who reject this message. By degrees We will punish them from directions they do not perceive
I will grant them respite. Truly powerful is My plan
Or is it that you ask them for a reward, so that they are burdened with a load of debt
Or that the unknown is in their hands, so that they can write it down
So wait with patience for the command of your Lord, and do not be like the companion of the fish when he cried out in agony
Had grace from his Lord not reached him he would indeed have been cast up on the naked shore in disgrace
So his Lord chose him and made him of the company of the righteous
And the unbelievers would nearly trip you up with their eyes when they hear the message and they say, “Surely he is possessed.”
But it is nothing less than a message for all the systems of knowledge
And what will cause you to realize what the sure reality is
The Thamud and the ‘Ad people branded as false the stunning calamity
But the Thamud, they were caused to perish, by a terrible storm
And the ‘Ad, they were caused to perish by a furious wind, extremely violent
He made it rage against them seven nights and eight days in succession. So that you could see the people lying prostrate in its path, as if they had been roots of hollow palm trees tumbled down
Do you see then any of them left surviving
